title: Create an account / Login
description: Login with your registered account or create a new account to register

title: Loan Request
description: Request a loan amount with a term duration.

title: Loan Approval
description: To approve, login / create an admin account..

title: Access Admin Panel
description: Login with Admin account and now you can see all the laons, can approve them.

title: Repay Loan
description: Once approved, you can repay the loan at given date provided to you.
